TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Span`1/Enumerator<T> extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 为 的元素提供枚举器。

span.span: Provides an enumerator for the elements of a .

remarks.format: 语言的[foreach](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/foreach-in.md)和 For Each ... C# C# [](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md)Visual Basic 中的下一个构造隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The C# [foreach](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/foreach-in.md) of the C# language and the [For Each...Next](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md) construct in Visual Basic hides the complexity of enumerators. 建议使用`foreach`或`For Each...Next` , 而不是直接操作枚举器。Instead of directly manipulating the enumerator, using `foreach` or `For Each...Next` is recommended. 最初, 枚举器位于中第一个元素之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the . 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 在读取的值之前,必须调用以将枚举器前进到中的第一项。You must call to advance the enumerator to the first item in the before reading the value of . 在调用之前 , 返回相同的值。 returns the same value until is called. 设置 为中的下一项。 sets to the next item in the . 如果传递的末尾, 则返回`false`。If passes the end of the , returns `false`. 当枚举器处于此状态时, 对的后续调用也将返回`false`并且未定义。When the enumerator is at this state, subsequent calls to also return `false` and is undefined. 您不能 再次将设置为中的第一项; 您必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first item in the again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 枚举器没有对的独占访问权限。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the . 此外, 还可以修改范围所基于的基础数据。In addition, the underlying data on which the span is based can also be modified. 因此, 在范围内进行枚举本质上并不是一个线程安全的过程。Therefore, enumerating through a span is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要保证枚举过程中的线程安全, 必须实现自己的同步。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you must implement your own synchronization. 例如, 下面的代码具有争用条件。For example, the following code has a race condition. 它不会确保在执行`ClearContents`方法之前枚举跨距。It does not ensure that the span will be enumerated before the `ClearContents` method executes. 因此, 在枚举范围期间将清除基础数组:As a result, the underlying array is cleared during enumeration of the span: [!code-csharp[System.Span.Enumerator-no-synchronization](~/samples/snippets/csharp/api/system/span.enumerator/nosync/program.cs)] 如果在枚举范围之前同步对数组的访问, 则在下面的示例中`EnumerateSpan` `ClearContents` , 方法的修改后的版本将不会修改基础范围内的数据。If you synchronize access to the array before enumerating the span, as the revised version of the `EnumerateSpan` method does in the following example, the `ClearContents` method doesn't modify underlying span data during enumeration. 请注意, 该示例将锁定范围所基于的基础数组。Note that the example locks the underlying array on which the span is based. [!code-csharp[System.Span.Enumerator-no-synchronization](~/samples/snippets/csharp/api/system/span.enumerator/sync/program.cs#1)] 不同于 .NET 中的其他枚举器结构,:Unlike some other enumerator structures in .NET, the : - 不实现或接口。Does not implement the or interface. 这是因为是[ref 结构](~/docs/csharp/reference-semantics-with-value-types.md#ref-struct-type)。This is because is a [ref struct](~/docs/csharp/reference-semantics-with-value-types.md#ref-struct-type). - 不包括`Reset`方法, 该方法可将枚举数设置为其在范围中第一个元素之前的初始位置。Does not include a `Reset` method, which can set the enumerator to its initial position before the first element in the span. (方法必须作为接口的一部分来实现, 但大多数实现者会引发异常或不提供实现。)(The method must be implemented as part of the interface, but most implementors either throw an exception or provide no implementation.)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As T
public: property T % Current { T % get(); };

summary.span: 获取对枚举器当前位置的项目的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the item at the current position of the enumerator.

value.span: 中位于该枚举数当前位置的元素。

span.span: The element in the at the current position of the enumerator.

remarks.format: `Current`在下列任一情况下均未定义:`Current` is undefined under either of the following conditions: - 在创建枚举器后, 该枚举器将置于范围中第一个元素之前。Immediately after the enumerator is created, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the span. 在读取的值`Current`之前, 必须调用以将枚举数前移到跨距的第一个元素。 must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the span before reading the value of `Current`. - 对 返回`false`的的最后一个调用, 指示范围的结束。The last call to returned `false`, which indicates the end of the span. `Current`在调用之前 , 返回相同的值。`Current` returns the same value until is called. 设置`Current`为范围中的下一项。 sets `Current` to the next item in the span.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

summary.span: 将枚举器推进到 的下一项。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next item of the .

returns.span: 如果枚举器成功推进到下一项，则为 ；如果已通过范围的末尾，则为 。

span.span: if the enumerator successfully advanced to the next item; if the end of the span has been passed.

remarks.format: 创建枚举器后, 该枚举数将定位到范围中的第一个元素之前, 第一次`MoveNext`调用会将枚举数前移到范围中的第一项。After an enumerator is created, it is positioned before the first element in the span, and the first call to `MoveNext` advances the enumerator to the first item in the span. 如果`MoveNext`越过范围的末尾, `MoveNext`则返回`false`。If `MoveNext` passes the end of the span, `MoveNext` returns `false`. 在此状态下, 对`MoveNext`的后续调用也将返回。 `false`When the enumerator is at this state, subsequent calls to `MoveNext` also return `false`.
